front.title: An Internet Protocol Version 6 (IPv6) Profile for 3GPP Mobile Devices

abstract.t: This document defines an IPv6 profile that a number of operators recommend in order to connect 3GPP mobile devices to an IPv6-only or dual-stack wireless network (including 3GPP cellular network and IEEE 802.11 network). This document defines a different profile than the one for general connection to IPv6 cellular networks defined in the IPv6 for Third Generation Partnership Project (3GPP) Cellular Hosts document. In particular, this document identifies also features to deliver IPv4 connectivity service over an IPv6-only transport. Both hosts and devices with capability to share their WAN (Wide Area Network) connectivity are in scope.
